anytime: We suffer more in imagination than reality
Tell your parents you love them
Remember when you wanted/n everything you have today
Wealth is not having many things;/n it is wanting few
You can do anything you want to
Difficulties strengthen the mind/n as labor strengthens the body
A gem cannot be polished without friction,/n nor a man without trials
morning: Take a walk/n and plan your day
Make your bed,/n make your life
I don't face The Trials today./n The Trials face me.
evening: Take a moment to be grateful for today
